title: "Both Yasuo and Kalista are explorations of non-cooldown based mobility paradigms." -Certainly T
body:
Seriously?

What part of "non-cooldown based mobility" sounds like a healthy thing for this game? Like, if they were *significantly* worse at everything else they did in exchange for that, it'd be kind of ok, but I don't think that's true of Yasuo and it's definitely not going to be true of any champion who is ranged and builds AD.
